title: Subnautica Expansion/Stand-Alone
body:
{{champion:267}} Hey everyone! Im not sure how strongly anyone on here feels about Subnautica but it is one of my favourite survival type games (even if it scares the crap out of me). I just wanted to let others know if they were interested in it that their new expac/stand alone game is being released to early access tomorrow, with a trailer as well as a stream I believe?

Here is some info!
https://unknownworlds.com/subnautica/subnautica-below-zero/

https://unknownworlds.com/subnautica/below-zero-early-access/
